summary: This entry in the 2013 unreported cases of the Supreme Court of Ghana lists a civil appeal concerning an application for judicial review and certiorari filed by Obaa Panin Amma Mansa and others. The case involves a dispute before the Judicial Committee of the Brong Ahafo Regional House of Chiefs in Sunyani, concerning Nana Yaa Adutwumwaa and others. The Republic is also a party in an ex parte application related to the same matter. The core issue likely involves the validity of a traditional leadership or land decision and the jurisdiction or procedure of a regional house of chiefs.
verdict: Not specified in the source document.
winningSide: Not specified in the source document.
confidenceNotes: The document appears to be a table of unreported cases from the Supreme Court of Ghana in 2013, not a full judgment. As such, details are limited to case titles and procedural information.
